channel.title: CVE Feed for StylemixThemes -- uListing (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StylemixThemes -- uListing (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36874|2024-08-04T01:01:59.840Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5).

item.title: CVE-2021-36880|2024-08-04T01:01:59.679Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.3), vulnerable parameter: custom.

item.title: CVE-2021-36878|2024-08-04T01:01:59.825Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5) makes it possible for attackers to update settings.

item.title: CVE-2021-36876|2024-08-04T01:01:59.728Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5) as it lacks CSRF checks on plugin administration pages.

item.title: CVE-2021-36877|2024-08-04T01:01:59.931Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5) makes it possible for attackers to modify user roles.

item.title: CVE-2021-36875|2024-08-04T01:01:59.731Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5). Vulnerable parameters: &filter[id], &filter[user], &filter[expired_date], &filter[created_date], &filter[updated_date].

item.title: CVE-2021-36879|2024-08-04T01:01:59.798Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5). Possible if WordPress configuration allows user registration.
